channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Atlas eDiscovery Process Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Atlas eDiscovery Process Management

item.title: CVE-2017-1354|2024-09-17T01:07:00.490Z -- ibm -- atlas%20ediscovery%20process%20management
item.description: IBM Atlas eDiscovery Process Management 6.0.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 126681.

item.title: CVE-2017-1355|2024-09-17T03:03:01.088Z -- ibm -- atlas%20ediscovery%20process%20management
item.description: IBM Atlas eDiscovery Process Management 6.0.3 stores sensitive information in URL parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history. IBM X-Force ID: 126682.

item.title: CVE-2017-1353|2024-09-17T01:06:59.874Z -- ibm -- atlas%20ediscovery%20process%20management
item.description: IBM Atlas eDiscovery Process Management 6.0.3 could allow an authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information when an unsuspecting user clicks on unsafe third-party links. IBM X-Force ID: 126680.
